sunnysunshiney - Package description goes here
--------------------------------------

Installation
------------

Use::

    > sudo pip install sunnysunshiney

or::

    > sudo easy install sunnysunshiney

or::

    > git clone git://github.com/uniphil/sunnysunshiney-py.git
    > cd sunnysunshiney-py
    > sudo make install
